supplied with the source code of the GnuCOBOL compiler, in the top-level directory. If you find any, please report it as a bug for the Programmer’s Guide so that it can be fixed.

trans-unit.source: switch with the “upper” option (i.e. --fold-call=upper) to the GnuCOBOL compiler. Similarly, library names could be folded to lower-case by using the “lower” option (i.e. --fold-call=lower. If libraries are maintained entirely using upper- or lower-case file names, either of these options will allow libraries to be found regardless of how the programmer entered their names on CALL statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ upper”选项（即 --fold-call=upper ）切换到GnuCOBOL编译器。同样，可以使用“ lower”选项将库名折叠为小写字母（即 --fold-call=lower 。如果完全使用大写或小写文件名来维护库，则这两个选项中的任何一个都将允许库无论程序员如何在 CALL 语句中输入其姓名，都可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: switch with the upper option (i.e. --fold-copy=upper) to the GnuCOBOL compiler. Similarly, names could be folded to lower-case by using the lower option (i.e. --fold-copy=lower. If copybook libraries are maintained entirely using upper- or lower-case file names and extensions, either of these options will allow copybooks to be found regardless of how the programmer entered their names on COPY statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 upper 选项（即 --fold-copy=upper ）切换到GnuCOBOL编译器。同样，可以使用 lower 选项（即 --fold-copy=lower )将名称折叠为小写。如果完全使用大写或小写文件名和扩展名来维护抄写本库，则这些选项中的任何一个都将允许抄写本无论程序员如何在 COPY 语句上输入其姓名，都可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: used the input field is cleared prior to input and this is the default but can be changed by the use of compiler steering command -faccept-with-update that can be input when starting the compiler or included in the configuration file e.g., default.conf used when selected by default

trans-unit.source: used, then an actual ‘

used, then an actual+or-character will be inserted into the field’s value as the first LEADING or last TRAILING character. Note that having this character embedded within the data item’s storage does not prevent the data item from being used as a source field in arithmetic operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用时，实际的 + 或 - 字符将作为第一个 LEADING 或最后一个 TRAILING 字符插入到字段的值中。请注意，将此字符嵌入数据项的存储区中并不会阻止该数据项在算术运算中用作源字段。

trans-unit.source: wrench in their toolbox, but with a massive code base still in production now and for the foreseeable future, adding COBOL to a multi-lingual curriculum vitae (CV) and/or resume (yes — they ARE different) is not a bad thing at all. Knowing COBOL as well as the language du-jour will make you the smartest person in the room when the discussion of migrating the current "legacy" environment to a "modern" implementation comes around.
trans-unit.target: 在他们的工具箱中使用扳手，但由于现在和在可预见的将来仍在生产大量代码，因此将COBOL添加到多语言履历（CV）和/或履历表中（是的，它们是不同的）并不是一件坏事。所有。当讨论将当前“传统”环境迁移到“现代”实现的讨论时，了解COBOL以及du-jour语言将使您成为会议室中最聪明的人。

trans-unit.source: wrench in their toolbox, but with a massive code base still in production now and for the foreseeable future, adding COBOL to a multi-lingual curriculum vitae (CV) and/or resume (yes — they ARE different) is not a bad thing at all. Knowing COBOL as well as the language du-jour will make you the smartest person in the room when the discussion of migrating the current “legacy” environment to a “modern” implementation comes around.
trans-unit.target: 在他们的工具箱中使用扳手，但是由于现在和在可预见的将来仍在生产大量代码，因此将COBOL添加到多语言简历（CV）和/或履历表中（是的-它们是不同的）并不是一件坏事。全部。当讨论将当前的“传统”环境迁移到“现代”实现的讨论时，了解COBOL以及du-jour语言将使您成为会议室中最聪明的人。
